sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"学院，大学"之意。
means: college ： 多指大学内的学院，分科学院或科目较少的高等学校。
university ： 主要指综合大学，一般由多个学院组成。当泛指大学时通常用college表示。
institute ： 指设立有专门学科的学院，如外语学院、地质学院、建筑学院等。
school ： 指大学所属的学院或系。
academy ： 指(高等)专科院校或研究专门学术的学校。

sentence.Network_en: I've had the hots for him ever since he came to college.
sentence.Network_cn: 自从他来上大学后，我就对他春心萌动。

sentence.Network_en: We were in the same college, which was male-only at that time.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们那时在同一所学院，当时只招男生。

sentence.Network_en: The teacher training college put up a plaque to the college's founder.
sentence.Network_cn: 那所教师培训学院为该学院的创立者立了一块纪念牌匾。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin collegium 'partnership, association', from collega 'partner in office', from col- 'together with' + legare 'depute'

encyclopedia.content: college作为英文单词大学;学院的意思，同时还是一部电影的名称，该片是女导演德伯·哈根执导的第一部电影长片，导演是新手，演员也是启用一些年轻的演员，就连两名编剧也同样是献出了他们的处女作，也不可能投入太多资金，可谓是对本片的一大挑战，但影片取得了很好的票房价值。内容方面讲述凯文、卡特和莫里斯是三个拜把子的好哥们，在大学里这帮高中生们很快吸引了女生联谊会里美女们的目光，把兄弟会大哥们被气得够呛，从这里开始就产生了戏剧性的故事，影片的精彩就从此开始了。

entry.def: A college is an institution where students study after they have left school.

example.ex: Their daughter Joanna is doing business studies at a local college...
example.tran: 他们的女儿乔安娜在当地的一所学院念商科。

example.ex: Stephanie took up making jewellery after leaving art college this summer...
example.tran: 斯蒂芬妮今年夏天离开艺术学院后开始从事珠宝制作。

entry.def: A college is one of the institutions which some British universities are divided into.

example.ex: He was educated at Balliol College, Oxford.
example.tran: 他上的是牛津大学的贝利奥尔学院。

entry.def: At some universities in the United States, colleges are divisions which offer degrees in particular subjects.

example.ex: ...a professor at the University of Florida College of Law.
example.tran: 佛罗里达大学法学院的一位教授

entry.tran: (用于英国某些收费中学的名称中)中学，公学
entry.def: College is used in Britain in the names of some secondary schools which charge fees.

example.ex: In 1854, Cheltenham Ladies' College became the first girls' public school.
example.tran: 1854年，切尔滕纳姆女子中学成为第一所女子公学。

entry.def: A college of a particular kind is an organized group of people who have special duties and powers.

example.ex: He is a member of the Royal College of Physicians...
example.tran: 他是皇家内科医师协会的成员。

example.ex: There is a college of international supervisors working together.
example.tran: 一群来自世界各地的主管在一起工作。

means.word_mean: 1. the body of faculty and students of a college
2. an institution of higher education created to educate and grant degrees; often a part of a university
4. a complex of buildings in which a college is housed

list.explanation: (大学生用语)农学院，(设在农村、规模较小的)学院或大学

example.en: Every instruc-tor in every cow college is trying to get lo be an as-sistant professor.
example.zh: 设在农村、名声不大的各个乡村学院中的教员们，人人都在争取当上助理教授。

auth_sentence.content: Elmira College is a major center of Twain scholarship.
auth_sentence.res_content: Elmira College is a major center of Twain scholarship.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Elmira College is a major center of Twain scholarship.

auth_sentence.content: I had that in my junior year in college.
auth_sentence.res_content: I had that in my junior year in college.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I had that in my junior year in college.

auth_sentence.content: J. Richard Gott was Mark's advisor in college.
auth_sentence.res_content: J. Richard Gott was Mark's advisor in college.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: J. Richard Gott was Mark's advisor in college.

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不+legitimate合法的→adj.不合法的,私生的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+al……的→adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法的, 合理的, 正统的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+itm+ate表形容词→adj.合法的, 合理的, 正统的
il不+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
legend[n.传说,传奇;图例]+ary……的→adj.传说的,传奇的
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑
stems_affixes.word_buile: illegitimate[adj.不合法的,私生的]+cy表名词→n.不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法,墨守陈规,法律上的义务
stems_affixes.word_buile: legal[adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的]+ity表名词→n.合法,墨守陈规,法律上的义务

stems_affixes.value_cn: 学院,高等专科学校,大学
stems_affixes.word_buile: col共同+leg讲,读,说+e→共同说,共同读的地方→大学
leg讲,读,说+end→讲出的东西→传奇的故事;引申为地图的图例

stems_affixes.value_cn: 功课,课;一堂课,一节课;[常复]课程;教训
stems_affixes.word_buile: less=leg讲,读,说+on表名词→讲话,教训→课
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表
re反+leg法律+ate表动词→反法律的人被放逐

means.word_mean: 大学, 学院; 高等专科学校

sentences.en: Our daughter is going to college in autumn.
sentences.cn: 我们的女儿秋天就要上大学了。

jushi.english: If you go to college, you must work hard, not fool around.
jushi.chinese: 你要是上大学,就得好好学习,不能虚度光阴。

jushi.english: He says he has dropped out, and won't attend college any more.
jushi.chinese: 他说他退了学,以后也不会去上大学了。

jushi.english: The statisticians averaged out the number of people receiving college degrees in every one thousand persons.
jushi.chinese: 统计学家算出了每千人中受大学教育的平均数。
